text:
@lynneSimpkin I can help! 👩‍🏫
9am: Socialism - what is it and why do we need it so bad?

11am: Activism skills session!
12pm: Lunch (beans on toast)
1pm: Why Minecraft really is boring no matter what anyone says
2pm: Human pyramids 🙃
